Title: Relates to certain records under the control of child protective services
Summary: Decreases the amount of time from eight years to four years for the office of children and family services to inform the provider or licensing agency, or child care resource and referral programs whether or not the person is the subject of an indicated child abuse and maltreatment report.
LawCode: Amd ยง424-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the sealing of certain records
